metadata.metaValue: Update the connectivity/adjacency of the mesh so it can read the mesh data correctly
We do a for each to go through each face island
Add the properties to the object, based on input names.

So lets say that we have 5 pts per face.

What we are doing with the sequence array is getting the size (those 5 pts) and  with current index we give them the same ID per face and since the step is 0 is all the same value per island
This is bascially doing per face ID if you need to save or use the data as a face component instead of point
